sentences.en: Batmanghelidjh is easily as stylish as Madonna and certainly a more zeitgeist personality.
sentences.cn: 巴曼贺里第与麦当娜一样时尚,当然更具个人的时代魅力.

sentences.en: He has caught the zeitgeist of life in the 1960s very well indeed.
sentences.cn: 他确实非常准确地描绘出了20世纪60年代乡村生活的真实风貌。

sentences.en: He has caught the zeitgeist of rural life in the 1980s very well indeed.
sentences.cn: 事实上，他非常准确地描绘出了20世纪80年代乡村生活的真实风貌。

sentences.en: Its somewhat old - fashioned profile, with branches in far - flung parts of China, plays to the new zeitgeist.
sentences.cn: 农行有些过时的形象(在中国许多偏远地区设有网点), 符合新的时代精神.

sentences.en: Now the zeitgeist has shifted 180 degrees, and freelance is no longer a synonym of freedom.
sentences.cn: 现在时代观念来了个180度的转弯, 自由职业者已经不再是自由的同义词.

sentences.en: The Zeitgeist of these centuries operated against the development of a pure science.
sentences.cn: 这几世纪的时代精神阻碍了纯粹科学的发展.

trans.tran_cn: （尤指文学、哲学和政治中表现出的）时代精神，时代思潮
trans.tran_en: the general spirit or feeling of a period in history, as shown by people’s ideas and beliefs at the time
